Definition at line 58 of file menu_view.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $Cache = get_package( 'cache' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
                        $this->Output = $Cache->get_data( 'menu_'.$Options->get_setting( 'menu_name' ) );
                        
                        if( $this->Output === false )
                        {
                              $this->Output = '<div class="top_menu">';
                              $MenuAccess = get_package( 'menu::menu_access' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
                              $Result = $MenuAccess->get_menu_items( $Options->get_setting( 'menu_name' ) );
                              foreach( $Result as $r )
                              {
                                    $this->Output .= get_field( $r , 'href' );
                              }
                              $this->Output .= '</div>';
                              $Cache->add_data( 'menu_'.$Options->get_setting( 'menu_name' ) , $this->Output );
                        }
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }
